content: until hat measures approx 2 from rounds 6-8 knit around cast-on edge round 9 k2tog around hat body switch to larger gauge needle and knit two rounds finishing color change round with cc held double yo break yarn leaving a 12 tail and thread tail k2tog around through remaining 9 sts to draw close knit 9 more rounds in cc hat measures approx 5 weave in ends wet block and lay flat to dry from cast-on edge with mc held double work color change round again knit 5 more rounds in mc hat measures approx 6 from cast-on edge 3 hat for all seasons version 1 // @2022 the lamb & kid // all rights reserved for personal use only no portion of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form or by any means without written permission visit follow share visit us follow us share with us 740 winslow way east #thelambandkid @thelambandkid bainbridge island wa and the lamb & kid www thelambandkid com #tlkhatforallseasons the lamb & kid 4 hat for all seasons version 1 // @2022 the lamb & kid // all rights reserved for personal use only no portion of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form or by any means without written permission
